channel.title: Roma 742 || Grand exchange || Clan wars || clue scrolls || Custom dungeoneering
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=3][B]Links[/B][/SIZE] [B][URL=http://"http://roma742.com/"]website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://roma742.com/vote/"]Vote[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/ai0gzzwbvv7bjx8/webclient.htm"]webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ilglpdvxy4pderg/roma742.jar"]Download client[/URL][/B][/CENTER] [B][CENTER]We are still working on the website![/CENTER][/B] [LEFT]Roma 742 is a brand new economy server (2/25/14) but don’t let that fool you, I’ve been working on it for some time now and have years of experience in java coding. I plan on making this the best server that I can, it’s not your ordinary server. I want it to feel as if it was pre EoC, adding every little detail that I possible can.
FEATURES - 100% all skills trainable - Custom dungeoneering - 8 Minigames - Full fight Kiln, Zombies Inflection, Castle/Clan Wars - Achievements needed to get completionist cape/(call) other than all 99’s - Dangerous points (killing npc’s/pking in wildy) with great rewards! - Working on all npc spawns in wilderness on runescape - Working on all item drops on Runescape (not monster drops) - Random events - Fully working Grand exchange - Good economy - Achievements in a lot of skills that reward you with certain things - Custom home (not your boring edgeville) - Skill points (each time you level a non combat skill you get 1 which can be exchanged) - Custom Control Book which is very useful - 2 spins of Squeal of Fortune each day - Tons of bosses with a reasonable drop rate[/LEFT]
[B][CENTER]Screenshots[/CENTER][/B]
[IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/8900/sedp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/336/3dmp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/6084/2wwr.png[/img]

item.description:
@dutchxxje wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=3][B]Links[/B][/SIZE]
[B][URL=http://“http://roma742.com/”]website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://roma742.com/vote/”]Vote[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/ai0gzzwbvv7bjx8/webclient.htm”]webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ilglpdvxy4pderg/roma742.jar”]Download client[/URL][/B][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]We are still working on the website![/CENTER][/B]
[LEFT]Roma 742 is a brand new economy server (2/25/14) but don’t let that fool you, I’ve been working on it for some time now and have years of experience in java coding. I plan on making this the best server that I can, it’s not your ordinary server. I want it to feel as if it was pre EoC, adding every little detail that I possible can.

FEATURES

  • 100% all skills trainable
  • Custom dungeoneering
  • 8 Minigames - Full fight Kiln, Zombies Inflection, Castle/Clan Wars
  • Achievements needed to get completionist cape/(call) other than all 99’s
  • Dangerous points (killing npc’s/pking in wildy) with great rewards!
  • Working on all npc spawns in wilderness on runescape
  • Working on all item drops on Runescape (not monster drops)
  • Random events
  • Fully working Grand exchange
  • Good economy
  • Achievements in a lot of skills that reward you with certain things
  • Custom home (not your boring edgeville)
  • Skill points (each time you level a non combat skill you get 1 which can be exchanged)
  • Custom Control Book which is very useful
  • 2 spins of Squeal of Fortune each day
  • Tons of bosses with a reasonable drop rate[/LEFT]

[B][CENTER]Screenshots[/CENTER][/B]
